jsPlumbUtil. EventGenerator

Provides event bind/fire functionality.

new EventGenerator()

Source:
  • util-api.js, line 19

Methods

bind(event, listener, insertAtStart)

Binds a listener to an event.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
event String

Name of the event to bind to.
listener Function

Function to execute.
insertAtStart Boolean <optional>
 false

Whether or not to insert this listener at the start of the listener list, so it is fired before the other currently registered listeners.
Source:
  • util-api.js, line 21

cleanupListeners()

Removes all listeners.

unbind(event)

Clears either all listeners, or listeners for some specific event.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
event String <optional>

Optional. constrains the clear to just listeners for this event.
